Today, my bipartisan Portable Fuel Container Safety Act passed out of the @EnergyCommerce Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce. This bipartisan bill will help keep people safe from preventable fires by implementing a standard for Flame Mitigation Devices.

My constituent, Margrett Lewis, came to me with her family’s story highlighting the dangers of fuel containers and I knew it was time for Congress to come up with a solution to prevent these tragic and deadly fires.

Tune in now for a markup of my bipartisan bill, the Portable Fuel Container Safety Act. This legislation will help keep children and families safe from fire accidents and was inspired by Sonoma’s own Margrett Lewis. Be sure to watch! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KSDAP71BZAo …

Per @NapaSheriff: Scammers are calling Napa County residents posing as Sheriff’s Office personnel. Please know the Sheriff’s Office would never contact you by phone threatening to jail you over unpaid fines.

Please know this is a scare tactic. It is not a practice of the Solano County Sheriff or local law enforcement. If you are contacted by these scammers, hang up immediately and contact Solano County Sheriff’s Office Dispatch at 707-421-7090.

Be advised @SolanoSheriff has received multiple reports of scammers posing as Sheriff’s Office personnel over the phone. These scammers are calling area residents and threatening them with arrest unless they pay off false court fines.
